trans-unit.source: The level at which you distribute material quantities.

seg-source.mrk: The level at which you distribute material quantities.

trans-unit.source: The order fulfillment responsibility is the basis on which the order fulfillment specialist's worklist is scoped and is therefore the level at which order fulfillment specialists redistribute materials with limited availability to orders.

seg-source.mrk: The order fulfillment responsibility is the basis on which the order fulfillment specialist's worklist is scoped and is therefore the level at which order fulfillment specialists redistribute materials with limited availability to orders.

target.mrk: 오더 이행 책임은 오더 이행 전문가의 작업 리스트 범위를 기준으로 하므로 오더 이행 전문가가 오더에 대한 가용성이 제한된 자재를 재분배하는 레벨입니다.

trans-unit.source: An order fulfillment responsibility is created for a specific split criterion, for example, a plant or a storage location, or a combination of multiple split criteria. Order fulfillment responsibilities are created, maintained and assigned to order fulfillment specialists in the <xref keyref="loio36e46c5791ff0322e10000000a44147b"/> app by users who have the business role Order Fulfillment Manager (R0226).

seg-source.mrk: An order fulfillment responsibility is created for a specific split criterion, for example, a plant or a storage location, or a combination of multiple split criteria.

Order fulfillment responsibilities are created, maintained and assigned to order fulfillment specialists in the <xref keyref="loio36e46c5791ff0322e10000000a44147b"/> app by users who have the business role Order Fulfillment Manager (R0226).

target.mrk: 오더 이행 책임은 플랜트나 저장 장소 또는 여러 분할 기준의 조합과 같은 특정 분할 기준에 대해 생성됩니다.
오더 이행 책임은 <xref keyref="loio36e46c5791ff0322e10000000a44147b"/> 앱에서 비즈니스 역할이 ‘오더 이행 관리자(R0226)’인 사용자에 의해 생성, 관리되고 오더 이행 전문가에게 지정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that an order fulfillment specialist can be responsible for processing multiple order fulfillment responsibilities. Use the <uicontrol>Switch Worklist</uicontrol> drop-down to switch between different order fulfillment responsibilities.

seg-source.mrk: Note that an order fulfillment specialist can be responsible for processing multiple order fulfillment responsibilities.
Use the <uicontrol>Switch Worklist</uicontrol> drop-down to switch between different order fulfillment responsibilities.

target.mrk: 오더 이행 전문가는 복수의 오더 이행 책임 처리를 담당할 수 있습니다.
다른 오더 이행 책임으로 전환하려면 <uicontrol>작업 리스트 전환</uicontrol> 드롭다운을 사용하십시오.
